nodes.documentation: 代币交易转移的内部实现
nodes.name: _transfer

nodes.documentation:
代币交易转移
从创建交易者账号发送`_value`个代币到 `_to`账号
     * @param _to 接收者地址
@param _value 转移数额
nodes.name: transfer
transferFrom

nodes.documentation:
设置某个地址（合约）可以交易者名义花费的代币数。
     * 允许发送者`_spender` 花费不多于 `_value` 个代币
     * @param _spender The address authorized to spend
@param _value the max amount they can spend
nodes.name: approve
approveAndCall

nodes.documentation: 销毁创建者账户中指定个代币
nodes.name: burn

nodes.documentation:
销毁用户账户中指定个代币
     * Remove `_value` tokens from the system irreversibly on behalf of `_from`.
     * @param _from the address of the sender
@param _value the amount of money to burn
nodes.name: burnFrom
mintToken
freezeAccount
setPrices

nodes.documentation: @notice Buy tokens from contract by sending ether
nodes.name: buy

nodes.documentation:
@notice Sell `amount` tokens to contract
 @param amount amount of tokens to be sold
nodes.name: sell

approve(address,uint256).notice: 设置某个地址（合约）可以交易者名义花费的代币数。     * 允许发送者`_spender` 花费不多于 `_value` 个代币

approveAndCall(address,uint256,bytes).notice: 设置允许一个地址（合约）以交易者名义可最多花费的代币数。

burn(uint256).notice: 销毁创建者账户中指定个代币

burnFrom(address,uint256).notice: 销毁用户账户中指定个代币     * Remove `_value` tokens from the system irreversibly on behalf of `_from`.

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).notice: 账号之间代币交易转移
